title: Gaura Mandala Parikrama 2024 | Virachandra Prabhu, Son of Lord Nityananda | Sri Jai Chaitanya Dasa
speaker: HG Jai Chaitanya Dasa

segments.key_quote: Bhirachandra Prabhu then took the stone back to Kardaha by floating it into the Ganges, as if it was too heavy to board onto a boat.
segments.summary: This segment narrates the story of how Bhirachandra Prabhu obtained the Shaligram Shila from the Nawab's palace in Murshidabad, highlighting the miraculous transformation of food into flowers and the floating of the stone on the Ganges.

segments.key_quote: The third deity which manifested from the Shaligramma Silla was an exact match.
segments.summary: This segment describes the process of carving the deity of Lord Shamsundara from the Shaligram Shila, the rejection of the first two deities, and the grand installation festival performed by Achyutananda.
